name: URL Simple Pattern
description:
Matches URLs like Youtube URLs etc.
The matched string must start with http or https
content:
Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NYWGXLuyH4M
Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with ctrl-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial.

Sample text for testing:
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"'
12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42
555.123.4567	+1-(800)-555-2468
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk
www.demo.com	shttp://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar
http://www.regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar
fff
http://regexr.com

shttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NYWGXLuyH4M
author: Pola Edward
